title: What is the passing marks required for special topics?
content: In special topics each ISA has a weightage of 10 marks and there is assignment for 5 marks, and the rest 25 come from ESA. So can someone here please tell me the minimum marks required to pass a special topic? Or you can't fail in special topics at all?

comments.body: Yes, you can fail a special topic. In order to pass any course, you need to score a minimum of 40% of the total marks. So, for the special topics that should be 20 out of 50.
